dict.acceptation: 工人，员工；劳动者；[虫]工蜂，工蚁；

sent.orig: Worker of white-collar worker white-collar is blue collar worker symmetrical.
sent.trans: 白领工人白领工人是“蓝领工人”的对称。

sent.orig: Another in bridge is the owner of worker worker and rural land.
sent.trans: 在桥梁的另一头是农民工和农村土地的拥有者。

sent.orig: Do good farmer worker worker to work, it is a major long-term strategy task.
sent.trans: 做好农民工工作，是一项重大的长期的战略任务。

sent.orig: Signal worker can't send hoisting signal until be ensure that no worker is in it.
sent.trans: 信号工要确保井筒内无人，才能发送升降信号。
